doc.field: Series III: Officers and Staff Members
Series III: Officers and Staff Members
Jewish Labor Committee Records, Part III
Jewish Labor Committee Records, Part III
Subseries G: Other Officers and Staff Members
Subseries G: Other Officers and Staff Members

This series contains the papers of several JLC staff members. Jacob Pat's papers focus on contacts with and aid to Polish Jewish refugees in Europe, Latin America, and Israel. Sydney Bykofsky's scrapbooks, photographs, and awards document his own achievements largely separate from the JLC. A subject file Bykofsky maintained on developments in Central America in the 1980s is also included. Paul Greenberg's papers mainly document the activities of the JLC's Washington, DC chapter, though they also relate to national administration. Finally, Jeanette DiLorenzo's papers document her work with the JLC's Educators' Chapter, but also largely with the United Federation of Teachers.
